channel.title: SSD on Rico's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in SSD on Rico's Blog

item.title: To SSD or Not To SSD
item.description: My MacBookPro is quite old now : MacBook Pro 5.1 (Late 2008) Core2Duo 2.66Ghz Under Lion, MBP appears to be sometime laggy even if I already updated it : Replaced original 4Gb RAM to 8Gb DDR3 (GSkill PC8500 SQ (1066 MHz), 7-7-7-20) Replaced original Hitachi 320GB/5400 RPM by a 500Gb WesternDigital Black Black 7200RPM (WD5000BEKT-75KA9T0) I run GeekBench 2.2.7 and give me a bench result of 3752 : Benchmark Summary Integer Score 3123 | Floating Point Score 5493 | Memory Score 2629 | Stream Score 2110 | Geekbench Score 3752 | System Information Operating System Mac OS X 10.
